skins.name: Lingyang
skins.description: A neat outfit Lingyang wears when performing liondances. It is adorned with a traditional pattern said to bring good luck, and the pattern is as vibrant as Lingyang's youthful energy.

97.name: Lion of Light, Blessings Abound
97.description: During Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Lion's Vigor</color>, Lingyang's Anti-Interruption is enhanced.

98.name:
Dominant and Fierce, 
Power Unbound
98.description: Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Lion Awakens</color> additionally recovers {0} Resonance Energy for Lingyang, triggered once every {1}s.

99.name:
Jaw-Dropping Feats, 
Loud and Wide
99.description: During Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Lion's Vigor</color>, Lingyang's Basic Attack DMG Bonus is increased by {0}, and Resonance Skill DMG Bonus increased by {1}.

100.name:
Immortals Bow, 
in Reverence Flawed
100.description: Outro Skill <color=Highlight>Frosty Marks</color> increases the Glacio DMG Bonus of all team members by {0} for {1}s.

101.name:
Seven Stars Shine, 
Stepped upon High
101.description: Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Strive: Lion's Vigor</color> additionally deals <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color> equal to {0} of Lingyang's ATK.

102.name:
Demons Tremble, 
Divine Power Nigh
102.description: In the Forte Circuit <color=Highlight><te href=850058>Striding Lion</te></color> state, during the first {0}s after every Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Mountain Roamer</color>, the Basic Attack DMG Bonus for Lingyang's next Basic Attack is increased by {1}.

params.name: Majestic Fists
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Lingyang performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack: Feral Roars</color></size>
After Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Furious Punches</color> is cast, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack 5</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Feral Roars</color>, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Lingyang consumes STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Lingyang consumes STA to perform a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
Use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.

params.name: Ancient Arts
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Ancient Arts</color></size>
Attack the target, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Furious Punches</color></size>
When <color=Highlight>Basic Attacks 3, 4, or 5</color> or Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Feral Roars</color> hits the target, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Ancient Arts</color> is replaced with Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Furious Punches</color>.
Lingyang's <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> cycle starts from <color=Highlight>Basic Attack 3</color> after casting Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Feral Roars</color> and Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Furious Punches</color> in turn.
<size=10> </size>
Lingyang's Resonance Skill does not reset his Basic Attack cycle.

params.name: Strive: Lion's Vigor
params.description:
Attack the target, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>, and receive the blessing of <color=Highlight>Lion's Vigor</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Lion's Vigor</color></size>
Lingyang gains {0} <color=Ice>Glacio DMG Bonus</color>.

params.name: Lion's Pride
params.description: DMG of the Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Lion Awakens</color> is increased by {0}.

params.name: Diligent Practice
params.description: Under the Forte Circuit <color=Highlight><te href=850058>Striding Lion</te></color> state, within {0}s after each <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color>, the next Forte Circuit <color=Highlight>Mountain Roamer</color> will deal an additional <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>, equal to {1} of <color=Highlight>Mountain Roamer</color> DMG, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.

params.name: Lion Awakens
params.description: Lingyang enters the battlefield, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.

params.name: Unification of Spirits
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack: Glorious Plunge</color></size>
When "Lion's Spirit" is full, use <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> to perform <color=Highlight>Glorious Plunge</color>, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack: Tail Strike</color></size>
When "Lion's Spirit" is not full, use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> after <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> to perform <color=Highlight>Tail Strike</color>, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Striding Lion</color></size>
After casting Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Glorious Plunge</color>, enter <color=Highlight>Striding Lion</color> state;
After casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Lion Awakens</color> or Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Strive: Lion's Vigor</color>, if "Lion's Spirit" is full, use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> to enter <color=Highlight>Striding Lion</color> state.
In the <color=Highlight>Striding Lion</color> state:
-Attacks can be launched in mid-air. If Lingyang is on the ground, use Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Glorious Plunge</color> to get back in the air.
-"Lion's Spirit" is continuously consumed before running out in {0}s, and when it runs out, <color=Highlight>Striding Lion</color> ends;
-If Lingyang is in the Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Lion's Vigor</color> state, the consumption speed of "Lion's Spirit" is reduced by {1}, extending <color=Highlight>Striding Lion</color> state by up to {2}s.
-Lingyang's <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Feral Gyrate</color>, which performs up to 2 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>;
-Lingyang's <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Mountain Roamer</color>, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>;
-When "Lion's Spirit" is less than {3}, use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> to perform <color=Highlight>Stormy Kicks</color>, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>; after performing Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Stormy Kicks</color>, the Mid-air Attack <color=Highlight>Tail Strike</color> becomes available.
-Concerto Energy is restored when "Lion's Spirit" is consumed.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Lion's Spirit</color></size>
Lingyang can hold up to {4} "Lion's Spirit".
When casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Furious Punches</color>, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.
When casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Lion Awakens</color>, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.
When casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Strive: Lion's Vigor</color>, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.

params.name: Frosty Marks
params.description: Lingyang releases a shock wave centered on the skill target, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color> equal to {0} of Lingyang's ATK to targets within the range.

params.name: Tune Break: Gauntlets
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
